Does the Marketplace Stripe integration support API version 2018-02-28 from Stripe? I need to upgrade the API in our Stripe account but don't want to break anything the marketplace is using for payment integration.
hi! we are currently on the older version, but I'll see what I can do to upgrade marketplace to the newest version.

So should I hold off on upgrading our version in our Stripe account then first? Looks like they mostly made changes to the Subscriptions section which doesn't deal with the Marketplace but wasn't sure. I suppose I can just switch it on and if it breaks I can maybe go backwards or just enable PayPal for payments.
